Package org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene

Class Summary
AbstractIndex  
DateField  
DoubleField The DoubleField class is a utility to convert double values into String values that are lexicographically ordered according to the double value.
FieldNames  
FilteredPropertyIterator  
FilteredScorer Implements a Scorer which only scores hits, that are not filtered out by the PackageFilter.
LocationStepQuery  
LongField  
LuceneQueryBuilder  
MatchAllQuery Specialized query that returns / scores all pages in the search index.
MatchAllScorer The MatchAllScorer implements a Scorer that scores / collects all documents in the index that match an optional field / atom-filter.
MatchAllWeight This class implements the Weight calculation for the MatchAllQuery.
NodeIndexer  
NodeIteratorImpl  
PackageFilter Implements a fulltext filter, based on a PathFilter.
PathFilter  
PathFilterQuery A PathFilterQuery is a wrapper around a native lucene query and adds a PackageFilter around that query.
